arts.ttl: Milan to Scout Brentford-Linked Genoa Midfielder
arts.sum: Milan will take a close look at Morten Frendrup during Monday’s match. The Rossoneri have been keen in the past already, but Genoa always shut the door at his departure, selling other cornerstones instead. Brenford have been working on the deal. arts.ttl: Serie A Preview: Genoa vs Milan – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Serie A Matchday 35 rounds off at Stadio Luigi Ferraris as Genoa and Milan renew hostilities in contrasting moods. With nothing but pride left to play for down the final stretch, the Griffins could throw a spanner in their visitors' hopes of pulling off a late European push. arts.ttl: Genoa vs. AC Milan to bring matchday 35 to an end
arts.sum: Milan and Genoa have drawn their last two Serie A meetings: they’ve not drawn three in a row in the top division since 1991-1992, with the 1991/92 season also the last in which the Rossoneri and the Rossoblu drew both matches. Christian Pulisic scored the only goal in the only match played in his career at the Ferraris against Genoa (1-0 on 7 October 2023); excluding central attackers (first or second strikers), the American could become the first Milan player to score more than 10 goals in the first two Serie A championships played with the Rossoneri since Luciano Chiarugi (1972/73 and 1973/74).
